events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer role and appreciate your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on your experience and the keywords in your resume.
A recruiter has been assigned to your profile to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process for the Software Engineer position.
You successfully passed the initial screening, demonstrating strong foundational knowledge relevant to our engineering projects.
Thank you for promptly responding to our screening feedback and providing your availability for the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 10th at 10 AM UTC with our lead software engineer.
You completed the technical interview demonstrating excellent problem-solving skills and knowledge of software development best practices.
Your HR interview has been arranged for April 15th to discuss company culture, benefits, and next steps in the hiring process.
The HR interview concluded positively, with both parties showing mutual interest in proceeding with the offer stage.
An offer for the Software Engineer role has been proposed to you including salary, benefits, and start date details.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
You have formally accepted the job offer as our new Software Engineer. We are excited to welcome you onboard.
Your onboarding process has started, including access to necessary tools, orientation sessions, and team introductions.
The recruitment case is now closed with the successful hiring of the candidate in the engineering department.
